articles.title: Sony Pictures CEO Says Netflix Was the “Right Home” for ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "At the time it made sense, but in hindsight you think maybe it could've been theatrical," Ravi Ahuja said at a Bank of America conference Thursday.

articles.title: Where To See A ‘Blood Moon’ Total Lunar Eclipse This Weekend - Forbes
articles.description: September’s Full Corn Moon rises in North America on Sept. 7, 2025, hours after a total lunar eclipse in India, China, Australia and the Pacific.
